overview: Cryptozoologist, Justin Wells, and his brother, cameraman Carter Wells, had a plan: create their own television series. They had an idea: travel the country in search of the elusive Sasquatch. They had a title: Pursuit of a Legend. They even had a place to film their pilot episode: the Widjigo Woods. What they didnâ€™t have... was a chance in hell.
tagline: Some things remain hidden for a reason
title: Pursuit of a Legend
